flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Theremins are instruments that create sound through movement. Most theremins use radio frequency's to do this, mine however uses light and shadows to do the same task. Using photo-resistors the 555 timer chip changes the pitch and tone of the sound produced. More information on the Light Theremin build can be found here:

http://www.instructables.com/id/Light-Th...

guide.summary: The Light Theremin is a simple audio circuit that uses light and shadows to create sound. Most Theremin circuits are normally quite complex; this one however uses a simple as a 555 Timer IC and some basic components.
